Computer analysis of this game is available at http://gameknot.com/analyze-board.pl?bd=18564045&rnd=0.21791306044906378

This game was an open challenge as part of my attempts to get my rating back above 1500, as it turned out it was one of the shorter games I have played for a while in that it was all over in twenty moves.

The game starts with my favoured english opening
